name: Lucas Breno de Souza Noronha Braga
about: As a Cloud Developer with a strong background in ReactJS,NodeJS, TypeScript, and AWS, I have developed a range of scalable, cloud-based applications and services for startups across a variety of industries. I am passionate about using technology to solve real-world problems and creating high-quality software that meets or exceeds the expectations of clients and end-users.
